title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Earning rewards on your business spending? Here's how to redeem for the best value
items.description: If you want to really get outsize value from your business card, the key is redeeming your points or miles in a smart way.

items.title: 10 of the best ways to redeem 100,000 Citi ThankYou Rewards points

items.title: Battle of the mid-tier hotel cards: Which card outshines the others?
items.description: While each of these hotel cards hover around the same annual fee, they differ in their benefits and offer perks that will benefit different travel sty...

items.title: Why I time my credit card applications around predictable big annual bills and elevated welcome offers
items.description: I plan new card applications around large, predictable bills to meet minimum spending requirements easily when welcome bonuses are elevated.

items.title: The ultimate guide to escorted, small-group and independent tours: Best itineraries, tips and more
items.description: TPG shares everything you want to know about guided, small-group and independent tours, including a look at the best itineraries and planning tips.
